reviewText: I love this entire series of dvd magazines and am sorry that production of them stopped.  They are fascinating and give a glimpse into so many different areas of the art world.  Very entertaining and informative.

This is a great format to "meet" artists and share their artistic visions.  I am a big fan of Nick Bantock, and just loved hearing him speak and show his work.  My one thought was that the intro by the producer was way too long, and I would love to skip over that somehow.
